projects.name: GAMEFUL, a Secret HQ for Worldchanging Game Developers
projects.blurb:
Good games make us better and change the world. 
We’re the people making and playing those games. 
We need a Secret HQ.

projects.name: Dungeon Chess - Putting Chess Into The Dungeon
projects.blurb: Dungeon Chess is what happens when tech. meets a board game based on the idea of Chess Meets Dungeon Characters - Infinite strategic possibilities!

projects.name: Indie Game Mag: Issue 13 and Get Well Gamers
projects.blurb: The Indie Game Magazine need advertisers and sponsors for our next issue and wants to help out Get Well Gamers along the way.

projects.name: Cracked: A puzzle adventure game for touchscreen devices
projects.blurb: Breaking and entering has never been this fun...or this legal.  Follow Gavin Pike IV as he discovers Harvest Park High School's dark conspiracy.

projects.name: 'A House in California,' a point+click art game
projects.blurb: This short, experimental adventure game will be released free & open source but also in a limited edition physical run.

projects.name: Infinite Blank
projects.blurb: A free online game where players draw the world and explore it together.  Meant to inspire creativity, entertain curiosity, and foster playfulness.

projects.name: REIGN of Ardwin
projects.blurb: For $2,500, I'll release this 25,000 word fantasy setting as a .pdf, for free, for everyone, forever.

projects.name: Hadean Lands: Interactive Fiction for the iPhone
projects.blurb: I'm going to write and sell a full-length text adventure for iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch). The game framework will be open source.

projects.name: POLAR ECLIPSE, a game of time and temperature
projects.blurb: A fun, educational game about Earth ~and climate. The conversation is lively, global, colorful and relevant. For ages 8 and up.

projects.name: Videogame Music in Context: DVD Interview Series
projects.blurb: An interview series on the creative context of videogame music: in Japan, for independent games, and at live chiptune events.

projects.name: Ruins of Lemuria: A New World D&D Campaign Sourcebook
projects.blurb: A New World Campaign Supplement –  for all fantasy role playing games and compatible with 3E, Pathfinder and 4E Dungeons and Dragons.

projects.name: Tribal Pride: Show your Pride, represent your Tribe!
projects.blurb: Tribal Pride is being design to bring the Educational Games Revolution to Social Networking Games subtlety and seamlessly.

projects.name: Gore Ninja - a visually stunning iPhone game
projects.blurb: Gore Ninja is an action game being developed for the iPhone and iPad featuring hand drawn animation, gorgeous backgrounds, and blood.

projects.name: Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 - A game for the whole family!
projects.blurb: This Project is going to create Orbit: Rocket Race 5000. Orbit is a fast paced family game that is packed with enjoyment for many years

projects.name: Game Manufacturers Association Trade Show Reporting Project
projects.blurb: Send two reporters to cover and report on the new games at The Game Manufacturers Association Trade Show

projects.name: "Deep Vistas" Poster Map Set
projects.blurb: This set of three full color double-sided posters empowers tabletop gamers to explore an underground realm of danger and intrigue!

projects.name: Kentucky Route Zero, a magic realist adventure game
projects.blurb: "Kentucky Route Zero" is a magic realist adventure game about a secret highway in Kentucky and the mysterious folks who travel it.

projects.name: 91 - A New Old RPG
projects.blurb: 91 is a role-playing game in a modern-day setting. It uses today's design sensibilities in a retro roguelike-like format.

projects.name: Skybrawler: An Epic-Scale RPG Platformer (PC Game)
projects.blurb: Skybrawler is a massive 2D RPG platformer that takes place on an exotic alien world, complete with rocket boots and rocket gloves.

projects.name: ORION: Prelude
projects.blurb: Do you like Dinosaurs?  Like Jetpacks?  Like Mechs - then you will love ORION: Prelude, a brand new game headed to digital markets.
